clip.quote: We buy a house every 13 minutes. We want to buy more.
clip.why_clipworthy: Demonstrates the scale and efficiency of New Western's operations.
clip.suggested_hook: Ever wondered how fast a real estate investment company can move?

clip.quote: You don't have to become an expert in real estate investment. You just have to see a house that you want to sell that would be really hard to list.
clip.why_clipworthy: Gives agents permission to leverage New Western without needing deep investment knowledge.
clip.suggested_hook: Not an investment expert? No problem!
